vulnerability.name: USN-7560-1
vulnerability.description: Josh Eads, Kristoffer Janke, Eduardo Nava, Tavis Ormandy and Matteo Rizzo discovered that AMD Microcode incorrectly verified signatures. An attacker with local administrator privilege could possibly use this issue to cause loss of confidentiality and integrity of a confidential guest running under AMD SEV-SNP.

statements.status_notes: AMD Microcode could lose the SEV-based protection of a confidential guest.
